column1: Arya sAgara nAga rAja paripRcCA nAma mahAyAna sUtram  sAgara saMskRte punar udDRtam namaH sarva budDa boDisattveByaH
column2: @313b rgya gar skad du / a'arya s'a ga ra n'a ga r'a dza pa ri pritstsha n'a ma m'a h'a y'a na s'u tra / bod skad du / 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /

column1: evam mayA Srutam  ekasmin samaye BagavAn budDaH sAgara nAga rAja AvasaTe viharati sma sArdDam sArDa dvAdaSa Sata BikzUNAm mahA saFGenaboDisattva mahAsattvEH
column2: bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /

column1: tasmin samaye BagavAn budDaH sAgara nAga rAjam avocat  nAga aDipate caturNAm Darma uddAnAnAm aBiDAne kriyamANe tad aBiDAnena caturaSIti Darma skanDa sahasrANAm aBiDAnam kRtam Bavati
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa / klu'i bdag po / chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no //

column1: katamAni catvAri taTA hi sarvezAm saMskArANAm anitya tAyAm boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH nirdizwam akzaya jQAnam pravartate
column2: bzhi gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /

column1: sarvezAm sa AsravANAm DarmANAm duHKa tAyAm boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH nirdizwam akzaya jQAnam pravartate
column2: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /

column1: sarvezAm DarmANAm anAtma tAyAm boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH nirdizwam akzaya jQAnam pravartate nirvANasya SAntatAyAm boDisattvEH mahAsattvEH nirdizwam akzaya jQAnam pravartate
column2: chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug 'jug pa dang / pa @314a *// dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ste /

column1: nAga aDipate etezAm caturNAm Darma uddAnAnAm aBiDAne kriyamANe tad aBiDAnena caturaSIti Darma skanDa sahasrANAm aBiDAnam kRtam Bavati
column2: klu'i bdag po / chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no //

column1: idam avocat BagavAn Atta manasaH BikzavaH sarve ca boDisattvAH BagavataH BAzitam aByanandan= iti
